quote: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: If you see fraud and do not say fraud, you are a fraud.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: Some lack the fickleness to live as they wish and just live as they have begun.
author: Seneca

quote: Tell me with whom you consort with and I will tell you who you are.
author: Goethe

quote: Character is fate.
author: Heraclitus

quote: To understand is to forgive.
author: Pascal

quote: It is much easier to follow a script than to develop the awareness and flexibility to be your own person.
author: Daniele Bolelli

quote: We read to know that we are not alone.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Reading brings us unknown friends.
author: Honoré de Balzac

quote: Accept responsibility for your life. Know that it is you who will get you where you want to go, no one else.
author: Les Brown

quote: I don’t regret the things I’ve done, I regret the things I didn’t do when I had the chance.
author: Unknown

quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
author: Joshua J. Marine

quote: One of the most important keys to Success is having the discipline to do what you know you should do, even when you dont feel like doing it.
author: Unknown

quote: Good things come to those who wait… greater things come to those who get off their ass and do anything to make it happen.
author: Unknown

quote: Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, or worn. It is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace & gratitude.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Go where you are celebrated – not tolerated. If they can’t see the real value of you, it’s time for a new start.
author: Unknown

quote: Dont be afraid to stand for what you believe in, even if that means standing alone.
author: Unknown

quote: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: Forget all the reasons it won’t work and believe the one reason that it will.
author: Unknown

quote: I am thankful for all of those who said NO to me. Its because of them I’m doing it myself.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found it yet, keep looking. Don’t settle.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Life is short, live it. Love is rare, grab it. Anger is bad, dump it. Fear is awful, face it. Memories are sweet, cherish it.
author: Unknown

quote: Life is like photography. You need the negatives to develop.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t worry about failures, worry about the chances you miss when you don’t even try.
author: Jack Canfield

quote: The pain you feel today is the strength you feel tomorrow. For every challenge encountered there is opportunity for growth.
author: Unknown

quote: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
author: Farrah Gray

quote: The only thing that stands between you and your dream is the will to try and the belief that it is actually possible.
author: Joel Brown

quote: We learn something from everyone who passes through our lives.. Some lessons are painful, some are painless.. but, all are priceless.
author: Unknown

quote: Being happy doesn't mean that everything is perfect. it means that you’ve decided to look beyond the imperfections.
author: Unknown

quote: Nobody ever wrote down a plan to be broke, fat, lazy, or stupid. Those things are what happen when you don’t have a plan.
author: Larry Winget

quote: Three things you cannot recover in life: the WORD after it’s said, the MOMENT after it’s missed and the TIME after it’s gone. Be Careful!
author: Unknown

quote: Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
author: Carl Bard

quote: Rule #1 of life. Do what makes YOU happy.
author: Unknown

quote: Walk away from anything or anyone who takes away from your joy. Life is too short to put up with fools.
author: Unknown

quote: Love what you have. Need what you want. Accept what you receive. Give what you can. Always remember, what goes around, comes around...
author: Unknown

quote: Just remember there is someone out there that is more than happy with less than what you have.
author: Unknown

quote: The biggest failure you can have in life is making the mistake of never trying at all.
author: Unknown

quote: Life has two rules: #1 Never quit #2 Always remember rule #1.
author: Unknown

quote: It's funny how day by day, nothing changes. But when you look back everything is different.
author: Calvin & Hobbes

quote: Don't take life so seriously. It's not like you're going to get out alive!
author: Louise Smith

quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The greatest day in your life and mine is when we take total responsibility for our attitudes. That's the day we truly grow up.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: What we think determines what happens to us, so if we want to change our lives, we need to stretch our minds.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Life is ten percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
author: William James

quote: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

quote: Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: When life is too easy for us, we must beware or we may not be ready to meet the blows which sooner or later come to everyone, rich or poor.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well.
author: Voltaire

quote: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young. The greatest thing in life is to keep your mind young.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: The quality of a person's life is in direct proportion to their commitment to excellence, regardless of their chosen field of endeavor.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Communication is a skill that you can learn. It's like riding a bicycle or typing. If you're willing to work at it, you can rapidly improve the quality of every part of your life.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: The secret of success is learning how to use pain and pleasure instead of having pain and pleasure use you. If you do that, you're in control of your life. If you don't, life controls you.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Great men are not born great, they grow great.
author: Mario Puzo, from The Godfather

quote: All things are difficult before they are easy.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.
author: Ian Maclaren

quote: Have I not destroyed my enemy when I have made him into my friend?
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Science is not perfect. It’s often misused; it's only a tool, but it’s the best tool we have. Self-correcting, ever-changing, applicable to everything; with this tool, we vanquish the impossible.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence wins championships.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: If you can’t explain it simply, you haven’t understood is well enough.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it.
author: George Santayana

quote: A Person who is happy is not because everything is right in his Life. He is happy because his attitude towards everything in his life is right
author: Sundar Pichai

quote: Dreaming to be someone else, is a waste of who you are.
author: Kurt Cobain

quote: The best teachers are those who show you where to look, but don't tell you what to see.
author: Alexandra K. Trenfor

quote: The caterpillar does all the work, but the butterfly gets all the publicity.
author: George Carlin

quote: Give a man a mask and he will show you his real face.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: We can be blind to the obvious, but we can also be blind to our blindness.
author: Daniel Kahneman

quote: Hope is a good breakfast, but it is a bad supper.
author: Sir Francis Bacon

quote: We suffer more in our imagination than in our reality.
author: Seneca

quote: He who fears death is already dead.
author: Zarathustra

quote: The true measure of a man is how he treats someone who can do him absolutely no good.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Being a little weird is just a natural side-effect of being awesome.
author: Sue Fitzmaurice

quote: Failure is not the opposite of success, it's part of success.
author: Arianna Huffington

quote: I don't want you to save me I want you to stand by my side as I save myself.
author: Unknown

quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
author: Confucius

quote: If you don't fight for what you want, don't cry for what you've lost.
author: Unknown

quote: Failure is success if we learn from it.
author: Malcolm S.Forbes

quote: your salary is the bribe they give you to forget your dreams.
author: Unknown

quote: Inside every self-made man is a poor kid who followed his dreams.
author: Unknown

quote: Before you say something, think how you would feel if someone said it to you.
author: Unknown

quote: Success comes from having dreams that are bigger than your fears.
author: Terry Litwiller

quote: Arguing with a fool proves there are two.
author: Doris M. Smith

quote: No amount of guilt can change the past, and not amount of worrying can change the future.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattab

quote: I can. I will. End of story.
author: Unknown

quote: A lion doesn't concern itself with the opinion of sheep
author: George R.R. Martin

quote: Complaining is silly. Either act or forget.
author: Stefan Sagmeister

quote: Don't allow someone to treat you poorly just because you love them.
author: Unknown

quote: You will never be admired without being criticized first.
author: Grant Cardone

quote: Be the reason someone smiles today.
author: Unknown

quote: Stop worrying about people that aren't worried about you.
author: Unknown

quote: A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies. The man who never reads lives only one.
author: George R.R. Martin
